definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: The most obvious is nuclear war.
The threats of prosecution and persecution have usually been enough to keep polygamists subdued. But lately they are becoming emboldened.
sentences.chinese: 濫交和強迫性行爲只是一夫多妻制最顯見的危害所在。

sentences.english: In unphotogenic slow motion, which makes the dire consequences harder to see.
sentences.chinese: 這是個很慢，可怕的後果並不顯見的過程。
